title: Understanding Workbook Visibility
text: Hiding a workbook can be useful when you want to focus on a specific task or prevent others from viewing certain data.

title: Reasons to Hide a Workbook
text: Consider scenarios where you might want to hide a workbook. It could be due to privacy concerns or to avoid distractions.

title: Common Reasons for Hiding Workbooks
text: What are some common reasons for hiding a workbook?
choices: you may have multiple workbooks open and want to only allow the user to view one of them
